title: Liz Truss
author: Liz Truss
content: Just amazing how CZ Binance didn't want another TERRA LUNA CONDITION IN CRYPTO AND HE SAVED IT.This is one of the most insane days in crypto I can remember.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: He learns from the mistake.LUNA case already gives him a bad vibes for a situation like this, so he don't want to get the same ended twice. It's better prevent rather than happening on some times, good jobs from him to secure the asset Binance.
